entry.title: A new "home" for fnl.es
entry.summary:
After months of looking for a loophole in my calendar to migrate my slightly outdated and mostly untended Google Blogger blog to something more modern, I have found the ideal timing: The birth and arrival of my son, Alexander LV (@AlexThe55th)!

The content will remain similar to earlier posts, while I will try to reduce the amount of private stuff and augment the articles about (mostly bio-) data science issues, in particular Natural Langugage Processing (NLP) and software engineering solutions. I hope to throw in the one or other "lifehacker" tip whenever appropriate.

For news and updates, feel free to follow me on twitter (@flowing).
